remarks: ` 0g ` is unaffected by restriction.  This is a bit more generic than ~ submnd0 (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Oct-2017.)
statement:
ress0g.s $e |- S = ( R |`s A ) $.
ress0g.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ress0g.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ress0g $p |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ .0. e. A /\ A C_ B ) -> .0. = ( 0g ` S ) ) $.
